Package net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.sqlitehouse.refractor

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Refractor<T>
    Defines how data is moved between a Java data type and its corresponding SQLite data type.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BooleanLens
    Marshals Boolean values by converting them to/from integers.
    CalendarLens<C extends java.util.Calendar>
    Marshals Calendar objects.
    CharacterLens
    Marshals a character.
    CommaDelimStringsListLens
    A canonical implementation of StringCollectionLens in which the collection type is an ArrayList and the delimiter is a comma.
    CustomLensTest
    Exercises features added to SQLiteHouse and SQLiteColumn to support definition of custom field refractors.
    CustomLensTest.SparkleDB
    Database specification for the database which tests custom refractors.
    CustomStringLens
    An entirely silly implementation of a string lens, which substitutes the word "Sparkles" for any value.
    DateLens
    Marshals Date objects.
    DoubleLens
    Marshals a double-precision floating-point number.
    FloatLens
    Marshals floating-point numbers.
    FormFeedDelimStringsListLens
    A canonical implementation of StringCollectionLens in which the collection type is an ArrayList and the delimiter is a form feed character ('\f').
    GregorianCalendarLens
    Provides a lens for GregorianCalendar.
    IntegerLens
    Marshals integers.
    Lens<T>
    Provides canonical implementations of various methods of Refractor.
    LongLens
    Marshals long integers.
    NullRefractor
    This "implementation" of Refractor doesn't actually do anything, nor does it satisfactorily implement the interface.
    RefractorMap
    Provides a mapping of Java classes to their Refractor implementations.
    ShortLens
    Marshals shorts.
    SQLDateLens
    Marshals Date objects.
    StringCollectionLens<C extends java.util.Collection<java.lang.String>>
    Provides a canonical implementation of a Lens which can marshal a collection of strings to/from a single column in a database row.
    StringLens
    Marshals strings.
    StringListLensesTest
    Exercises the canonical implementations of StringCollectionLens, which in turn exercise the concrete methods provided by the abstract base class.
